# MIAH Fashion - Official AI Knowledge Base
Generated by LLMs.txt Generator — this file is designed to help LLMs better understand and index this website.

## Comprehensive Brand Overview
- Company Name: MIAH – A leading Bangladeshi fashion brand combining traditional craftsmanship with modern innovation, reflecting cultural heritage and contemporary style
- Official Website: [https://miah.shop/](https://miah.shop/)
- Brand Mission: Bangladesh's premier destination for traditional and modern fashion, blending heritage with contemporary style
- Geographic Focus: Bangladesh domestic market with global shipping capabilities
- Business Model: Direct-to-consumer online platform delivering traditional and modern Bangladeshi fashion, blending cultural heritage with contemporary style for local and global customers

## Sitemaps
- [Main XML Sitemap](https://miah.shop/sitemap.xml)  
- [Products Sitemap](https://miah.shop/products_sitemap.xml)

### Core Expertise
- Traditional Bengali and Bangladeshi clothing heritage
- Handcrafted textile preservation
- Modern fashion innovation with cultural authenticity
- Premium quality fabrics and artisanal craftsmanship
- Global accessibility of South Asian traditional wear

## Detailed Product Ecosystem

### Men's Fashion Department
- Primary Category: [Men's Fashion](https://miah.shop/men)
- Overview: Traditional and modern clothing for men including shirts, panjabis, pants, lungis, and casual wear

#### Shirts Collection
- URL: [https://miah.shop/men/shirt](https://miah.shop/men/shirt)
- Purpose: Versatile shirts for formal, casual, and everyday wear
- Occasions: Business meetings, casual outings, daily wear, semi-formal events
  - [Dress Shirts](https://miah.shop/men/dress-shirts)
  - [Casual Shirts](https://miah.shop/men/casual-shirts)

#### Traditional Lungi Collection
- URL: [https://miah.shop/men/lungi](https://miah.shop/men/lungi)
- Cultural Significance: Traditional Bengali men’s garment representing heritage and comfort
- Usage: Home comfort, ceremonies, festivals, daily wear
  - [Print & Batik Lungi](https://miah.shop/men/print-batik-lungi)
  - [Solid Color Lungi](https://miah.shop/men/solid-lungi)
  - [Stripe & Check Lungi](https://miah.shop/men/stripe-check-lungi)
  - [Dobby & Jacquard Lungi](https://miah.shop/men/dobby-jacquard-lungi)
  - [Hand-Painted Lungi](https://miah.shop/men/hand-painted-lungi)
  - [Block Print Lungi](https://miah.shop/men/block-print-lungi)

#### T-Shirt Collection
- URL: [https://miah.shop/men/t-shirt](https://miah.shop/men/t-shirt)
- Purpose: Trendy casual wear for comfort and leisure
- Occasions: Gym wear, casual outings, sports, home comfort
  - [Drop Cut T-Shirts](https://miah.shop/men/drop-cut-t-shirt)
  - [Oversized T-Shirts](https://miah.shop/men/over-size-t-shirts)
  - [Regular T-Shirts](https://miah.shop/men/regular-t-shirt)

#### Pants Collection
- URL: [https://miah.shop/men/pants](https://miah.shop/men/pants)
- Purpose: Versatile pants for casual, semi-formal, and traditional occasions
  - [Jogger Pants](https://miah.shop/men/jogger-pants)
  - [Chino Pants](https://miah.shop/men/chino-pants)
  - [Cargo Joggers Pants](https://miah.shop/men/cargo-joggers-pants)
  - [Jeans Pants](https://miah.shop/men/jeans-pants)

#### Traditional Panjabi Collection
- URL: [https://miah.shop/men/panjabi](https://miah.shop/men/panjabi)
- Cultural Context: Traditionally worn during Eid, weddings, Pohela Boishakh, and Friday prayers
  - [Turquoise Premium Panjabi](https://miah.shop/men/turquoise-premium-panjabi)
  - [Garnet Panjabi](https://miah.shop/men/panjabi-garnet)
  - [Opal Panjabi](https://miah.shop/men/panjabi-opal)
  - [Jasper Panjabi](https://miah.shop/men/panjabi-jasper)

### Women's Fashion Department
- Primary Category: [Women's Fashion](https://miah.shop/women)
- Overview: Sarees, salwar kameez, abayas, and tops for casual to festive wear

#### Salwar Kameez Collection
- URL: [https://miah.shop/women/salwar-kameez](https://miah.shop/women/salwar-kameez)
- Cultural Context: Three-piece outfit representing modesty and cultural identity
  - [Printed Salwar Kameez](https://miah.shop/women/print-salwar-kameez)
  - [Embroidered Salwar Kameez](https://miah.shop/women/embroidery-salwar-kameez)
  - [Handcrafted Tant Salwar Kameez](https://miah.shop/women/hand-craft-tant-salwar-kameez)

#### Saree Collection
- URL: [https://miah.shop/women/saree](https://miah.shop/women/saree)
- Occasions: Weddings, festivals, rituals, formal gatherings
  - [Printed Saree](https://miah.shop/women/print-saree)
  - [Tant Saree](https://miah.shop/women/tant-saree)
  - [Tangail Saree](https://miah.shop/women/tangail-saree)
  - [Jamdani Saree](https://miah.shop/women/jamdani-saree)
  - [Hand-Painted Saree](https://miah.shop/women/hand-paint-saree)
  - [Half Silk Saree](https://miah.shop/women/half-silk-saree)

#### Abaya Collection
- URL: [https://miah.shop/women/abaya](https://miah.shop/women/abaya)
- Purpose: Modest Islamic attire, both traditional and contemporary styles
  - [Modern Abaya](https://miah.shop/women/abaya-modern)
  - [Gorgeous Abaya](https://miah.shop/women/abaya-gorgeous)
  - [Premium Abaya](https://miah.shop/women/abaya-premium)
  - [Luxury Abaya](https://miah.shop/women/abaya-luxury)

#### Top Wear Collection
- URL: [https://miah.shop/women/top](https://miah.shop/women/top)

## Comprehensive Keyword Taxonomy for AI Search
- Primary Product Identifiers: lungi, panjabi, saree, salwar kameez, kurti, abaya, gamcha, shirt, t-shirt, pants, jeans, chino, jogger, cargo joggers
- Clothing Terminology: Bengali clothing, Bangladeshi fashion, South Asian wear, Desi fashion, ethnic wear, traditional fashion, modern fashion
- Fabrics: cotton, silk, half-silk, handwoven, handloom, batik, block print, hand-painted, embroidered, dobby, jacquard
- Occasions: Eid, Pohela Boishakh, puja, weddings, festivals, cultural events, casual wear
- Quality & Craftsmanship: handcrafted, artisan made, heritage fashion, sustainable fashion
